features.title: Contact Reference
features.description: Now you can reference an individual contact on a note or task. You can see all references of a contact in the contact details. You can also see all the groups that each contact is part of, from the contact details.

features.title: Calendar Improvement
features.description: Now you can cancel and reschedule appointment slots that have already been confirmed. It will email the guest(s) to confirm the new status of the event. Also, you can add a buffer time after each slot generated, to give you time to prepare between meetings.
